fields.description:
*Assessment*

During verification testing of EUCA-10018, running 'euform-validate-template' failed on a nested cloudformation template.

{code}
# euform-validate-template --template-file cfn-nested-euca10018-template.json --region admin-hspencer@group1
DESCRIPTION	Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL
euform-validate-template: error: 'str' object has no attribute 'items'
{code}

*Signs*

* _euform-validate-template_ with debug flag
{code}
# euform-validate-template --template-file cfn-nested-euca10018-template.json --region admin-hspencer@group1 --debug
2014-12-23 03:08:15,092 DEBUG   ValidateTemplate parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'TemplateBody': <open file 'cfn-nested-euca10018-template.json', mode 'r' at 0x28d8420>, 'url': None, 'region': 'admin-hspencer@group1', 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'TemplateURL': None, 'secret_key': None}
2014-12-23 03:08:15,092 INFO    Config finding region option cloudformation-url
2014-12-23 03:08:15,092 DEBUG   Config   section group1
2014-12-23 03:08:15,092 INFO    Config   found   group1::cloudformation-url = 'http://cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/'
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config finding region option name
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 DEBUG   Config   section group1
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config   found   group1::name = 'group1'
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config finding global option max-retries
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config   novalue for max-retries
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config finding global option timeout
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config   novalue for timeout
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config finding region option verify-ssl
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 DEBUG   Config   section group1
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 DEBUG   Config   section *
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config   novalue for verify-ssl
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config finding user option key-id
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 DEBUG   Config   section admin-hspencer
2014-12-23 03:08:15,093 INFO    Config   found   admin-hspencer::key-id = 'AKI6GFWNSHOSBDXDFOZI'
2014-12-23 03:08:15,094 INFO    Config finding user option secret-key
2014-12-23 03:08:15,094 DEBUG   Config   section admin-hspencer
2014-12-23 03:08:15,094 INFO    Config   found   admin-hspencer::secret-key = <redacted>
2014-12-23 03:08:15,096 INFO    ValidateTemplate parameters: {'Action': 'ValidateTemplate', 'Version': '2010-05-15', 'TemplateBody': '{\n    "AWSTemplateFormatVersion" : "2010-09-09",\n    "Description" : "Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL",\n    "Resources" : {\n        "BucketStack" : {\n\t       "Type" : "AWS::CloudFormation::Stack",\n\t       "Properties" : {\n\t          "TemplateURL" : "https://s3.amazonaws.com/euca10129/cfn-bucket-template.json",\n              "TimeoutInMinutes" : "60"\n\t       }\n        }\n    },\n    "Outputs": {\n       "StackRef": {"Value": { "Ref" : "BucketStack"}},\n       "OutputFromNestedStack" : {\n             "Value" : { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "BucketStack", "Outputs.BucketName" ] }\n       }\n    }\n}\n'}
2014-12-23 03:08:15,096 INFO    CloudFormation sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2014-12-23 03:08:15,097 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\ncloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773\n/\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKI6GFWNSHOSBDXDFOZI&Action=ValidateTemplate&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&TemplateBody=%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%22AWSTemplateFormatVersion%22%20%3A%20%222010-09-09%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%22Description%22%20%3A%20%22Cloudformation%20Example%20%3D%3E%20Nested%20Stack%20that%20pulls%20CF%20template%20from%20S3%20URL%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%22Resources%22%20%3A%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22BucketStack%22%20%3A%20%7B%0A%09%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22Type%22%20%3A%20%22AWS%3A%3ACloudFormation%3A%3AStack%22%2C%0A%09%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22Properties%22%20%3A%20%7B%0A%09%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22TemplateURL%22%20%3A%20%22https%3A%2F%2Fs3.amazonaws.com%2Feuca10129%2Fcfn-bucket-template.json%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22TimeoutInMinutes%22%20%3A%20%2260%22%0A%09%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%7D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%22Outputs%22%3A%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22StackRef%22%3A%20%7B%22Value%22%3A%20%7B%20%22Ref%22%20%3A%20%22BucketStack%22%7D%7D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22OutputFromNestedStack%22%20%3A%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22Value%22%20%3A%20%7B%20%22Fn%3A%3AGetAtt%22%20%3A%20%5B%20%22BucketStack%22%2C%20%22Outputs.BucketName%22%20%5D%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%7D%0A&Timestamp=2014-12-23T03%3A08%3A15Z&Version=2010-05-15'
2014-12-23 03:08:15,097 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: 4tqKsEn3nRqb380/ui5H1lery2X3gKam3Kt2xcDnkvs=
2014-12-23 03:08:15,097 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request method: POST
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request url:    http://cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: Content-Length: 1108
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: Host: cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.2.0-pre1-24-gacb04e8 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-504.1.3.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.3 requests/1.1.0
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: AKI6GFWNSHOSBDXDFOZI
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Action: ValidateTemplate
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Signature: 4tqKsEn3nRqb380/ui5H1lery2X3gKam3Kt2xcDnkvs=
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   TemplateBody: {
    "AWSTemplateFormatVersion" : "2010-09-09",
    "Description" : "Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL",
    "Resources" : {
        "BucketStack" : {
	       "Type" : "AWS::CloudFormation::Stack",
	       "Properties" : {
	          "TemplateURL" : "https://s3.amazonaws.com/euca10129/cfn-bucket-template.json",
              "TimeoutInMinutes" : "60"
	       }
        }
    },
    "Outputs": {
       "StackRef": {"Value": { "Ref" : "BucketStack"}},
       "OutputFromNestedStack" : {
             "Value" : { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "BucketStack", "Outputs.BucketName" ] }
       }
    }
}

2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Timestamp: 2014-12-23T03:08:15Z
2014-12-23 03:08:15,103 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Version: 2010-05-15
2014-12-23 03:08:15,285 DEBUG   CloudFormation response time: 0.181 seconds
2014-12-23 03:08:15,285 INFO    CloudFormation response status: 200
2014-12-23 03:08:15,285 DEBUG   CloudFormation response header: content-length: 548
2014-12-23 03:08:15,285 DEBUG   CloudFormation response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
2014-12-23 03:08:15,285 DEBUG   ValidateTemplate -- response content --
<ValidateTemplateResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/"><ValidateTemplateResult><Capabilities><member>CAPABILITY_IAM</member></Capabilities><CapabilitiesReason>The following resource(s) require capabilities: [AWS::CloudFormation::Stack]</CapabilitiesReason><Description>Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL</Description><Parameters/></ValidateTemplateResult><ResponseMetadata><RequestId>14aac88c-a811-4dbf-9368-b7f5777e41df</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></ValidateTemplateResponse>
2014-12-23 03:08:15,286 DEBUG   ValidateTemplate -- end of response content --
DESCRIPTION	Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL
euform-validate-template: error: 'str' object has no attribute 'items'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euform-validate-template", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.cloudformation.validatetemplate.ValidateTemplate.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 237, in handle_cli_exception
    BaseCommand.handle_cli_exception(self, err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 296, in run
    cmd.print_result(result)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/cloudformation/validatetemplate.py", line 48, in print_result
    for key, value in result.items():
AttributeError: 'str' object has no attribute 'items'
{code}

*Pertinent Data*

* Eucalyptus Cloudformation service API returns correct response, but _euform-validate-template_ doesn't handle the response correctly:
{code}
<ValidateTemplateResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/"><ValidateTemplateResult><Capabilities><member>CAPABILITY_IAM</member></Capabilities><CapabilitiesReason>The following resource(s) require capabilities: [AWS::CloudFormation::Stack]</CapabilitiesReason><Description>Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL</Description><Parameters/></ValidateTemplateResult><ResponseMetadata><RequestId>14aac88c-a811-4dbf-9368-b7f5777e41df</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></ValidateTemplateResponse>
2014-12-23 03:08:15,286 DEBUG   ValidateTemplate -- end of response content --
DESCRIPTION	Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL
euform-validate-template: error: 'str' object has no attribute 'items'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euform-validate-template", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.cloudformation.validatetemplate.ValidateTemplate.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 237, in handle_cli_exception
    BaseCommand.handle_cli_exception(self, err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 296, in run
    cmd.print_result(result)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/cloudformation/validatetemplate.py", line 48, in print_result
    for key, value in result.items():
AttributeError: 'str' object has no attribute 'items'
{code}
* Nested template used:
{code}
# cat cfn-nested-euca10018-template.json
{
    "AWSTemplateFormatVersion" : "2010-09-09",
    "Description" : "Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL",
    "Resources" : {
        "BucketStack" : {
	       "Type" : "AWS::CloudFormation::Stack",
	       "Properties" : {
	          "TemplateURL" : "https://s3.amazonaws.com/euca10129/cfn-bucket-template.json",
              "TimeoutInMinutes" : "60"
	       }
        }
    },
    "Outputs": {
       "StackRef": {"Value": { "Ref" : "BucketStack"}},
       "OutputFromNestedStack" : {
             "Value" : { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "BucketStack", "Outputs.BucketName" ] }
       }
    }
}
{code}
* Version of euca2ools
{code}
# euca-version
euca2ools 3.2.0-pre1-24-gacb04e8 (Apollo)
{code}
fields.summary: euform-validate-template chokes on responses with capability info

comments.body: I committed a potential fix with commit {{8922741}}, but I don't have nearly the breadth of outputs to test that you do.  Does this look okay to you, [~hspencer]?

[~gholms],

I added an improvement in the following pull request:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/euca2ools/pull/59

Let me know if that makes sense.

[~gholms],

Meant to state too that I verified this issue was fixed.  Version of euca2ools:
{code}
# euca-version
euca2ools 3.2.0-pre1-55-g61d2930 (Apollo)

# euform-validate-template --template-file cfn-nested-euca10018-template.json --region admin-hspencer@group1
DESCRIPTION	Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL
CAPABILITY	CAPABILITY_IAM
{code}
